text: hi guys today I'm going to tell you how
to remove pin bones from a fish villain
so he has a beautiful Philip sea bass
and when I move my knife you can see and
hear the bones when you run the knife
from the head side towards the tail pin
bones always run towards the head so you
need to pull them out as if you were
pointing towards the head in the other
direction they will break so now you lay
your hand on the fish and you spread
your fingers apart so you can see the
bones so now I'm going to use my
tweezers and pull out the exposed bones
while I keep the fish the other hand on
its place
a near bowl of cold water and where you
can get rid of the bones so guys it's
really simple you expose the beam bones
by running your knife down the fish pull
out the bones towards the head with
tweezers get rid of the bones and
continue until all the bones are removed
guys this is how easy you remove pin
bones from a fish filleth if you need
more tips click on the link
